name: PIP XL
description:
PIP XL — cute puzzle game with pipes. Your goal is to connect the pipes together to pass the level.

Rotate the pipes, make a path, but think logically about the connections and try to make a proper flow and solve the puzzle. There is a 50 levels to complete, and the challenge becomes increasingly difficult as you progress. Enjoy a relaxing time connecting pipes.

In PIP XL:

- 50 levels
- Cool art
- Achievements
- Relax music
